# Vile Darkness (Domain)
## Overview
| **Deities:** | *Asgardian:* |  |
|---|---|---|
| | *Eberron:* |  |
| | *Golarion:* |  |
| | *Greyhawk:* | [[The Patient One]] |
| | *Kalamar:* |  |
| | *Krynn:* |  |
| | *Olympian:* |  |
| | *Other:* |  |
| | *Pharaonic:* |  |
| | *Toril:* |  |

**Granted Power:** You gain the [[Blind-Fight (Feat)|Blind-fight]] feat.

*Note:* This domain description is a revision of the Darkness domain presented in Book of Vile Darkness.

**Vile Darkness Domain Spells**

**1** **[[Darkvision (Spell)|Darkvision]]****:** See 60 ft. in total darkness.

**2 Darkbolt:** Deals 1d8 damage/2 levels and stuns 1 round.

**3** **[[Deeper Darkness (Spell)|Deeper Darkness]]****:** Object sheds absolute darkness in a 60-ft. radius.

**4** **[[Damning Darkness (Spell)|Damning Darkness]]****:** Darkness deals either 2d6 or 1d6 damage per round.

**5** **[[Black Tentacles (Spell)|Black Tentacles]]****:** 1d4+1/level tentacles grapple randomly within 15 ft.

**6** **[[Wall of Force (Spell)|Wall of Force]]****:** Wall manifests as an opaque black wall, is immune to damage.

**7** **[[Shadow Walk (Spell)|Shadow Walk]]****:** Step into shadow to travel rapidly.

**8** **[[Utterdark (Spell)|Utterdark]]****:** 100-ft./level radius of darkness that evil creatures can see through.

**9** **[[Screen (Spell)|Screen]]****:** Illusion hides area from vision, scrying.
